name: Miss Perfect Basketball - Girls Hoops Edition 2017
name_original: Miss Perfect Basketball - Girls Hoops Edition 2017
description:
100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED!
AWESOME HOOPS GAME!

Get ready for a fun basketball game made for girls! In Miss Perfect Basketball, you're up against the clock as you try to make as many perfect shots as you can!

Swish or bricks, its up to you to show you got the skills! Show everyone that you're indeed Miss Perfect!

FEATURES

- Multiple game modes!
- Cool sounds!
- Easy "flick/fling" controls.
